speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you very much for your speech, Commissioner, which was full of feeling and commitment and also very much in line with Parliament's concerns and demands.
original: President. Thank you very much for your speech, Commissioner, which was full of feeling and commitment and also very much in line with Parliament's concerns and demands.
agenda_item: Combating HIV/Aids within the EU and in the neighbouring countries 2006-2009 (debate)
